mapper.select: SELECT gc.user_id AS userId, gc.gift_coupon_id AS giftCouponId, gi.gift_id AS giftId, gi.gift_name AS giftName, gi.gift_url AS giftUrl, gi.dynamic_picture AS dynamicPicture, gi.charm_value AS charmValue, gi.gift_type AS giftType, count(1) num FROM gift_coupon gc INNER JOIN gift gi ON gi.gitf_code = gc.gift_coupon_id WHERE gc.user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY gc.user_id, gc.gift_coupon_id, gi.gift_id, gi.gift_name, gi.gift_url
mapper.delete: DELETE from gift_coupon where (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(STR_TO_DATE(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' )) + life ) < UNIX_TIMESTAMP( STR_TO_DATE( NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ))
mapper.insert: insert into gift_coupon (user_id, gift_coupon_id, life, create_time) values (#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{giftCouponId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{life,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
